mapper.select: SELECT f.id, f.genre_type, p.post_title, p.post_content, p.post_type, p.member_profile_id, p.created_date, p.updated_date, mp.profile_nickname, mp.member_id, m.profile_img_url FROM tbl_funding f JOIN tbl_post p ON f.id = p.id JOIN tbl_member_profile mp ON p.member_profile_id = mp.id JOIN tbl_member m ON mp.member_id = m.id WHERE m.id = #{memberId};

SELECT bfp.id, bfp.funding_send_status , fp.product_name, fp.product_price , bfp_mp .profile_name, bfp_mp .profile_email FROM tbl_buy_funding_product bfp JOIN tbl_funding_product fp ON bfp.funding_product_id = fp.id JOIN tbl_funding f ON fp.funding_id = f.id JOIN tbl_post p ON f.id = p.id JOIN tbl_member_profile mp ON p.member_profile_id = mp.id JOIN tbl_member m ON mp.member_id = m.id JOIN tbl_member_profile bfp_mp ON bfp.member_profile_id = bfp_mp.id WHERE m.id = #{memberId};
